text: E'ina hu'negu huno Nagri eri'za nemo'a hakare'a ama mopafi vahera zamazeri otisanige'za Nagrira monora hunantegahaze. Agrama haniaza nege'za kini vahe'mo'za keaga osugahaze. Na'ankure korapara ama ana zankura zamasamige'za ontahi'naza za nezamasamino, zamaveri hazage'za onke'nazaza zamaveri hanige'za nege'za, antahi amara osu'nazaza zamasamige'za ama' antahi'zama eri'za zanku anara hugahaze.
